Headline: No trains between Ashland and Midway
ShortDescription: Orange Line service has been temporarily suspended between Ashland and Midway due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line service has been temporarily suspended between Ashland and Midway due to police activity.

As a result, trains are operating only between Adams/Wabash and Ashland at this time.

 Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service through the affected area. //Shuttle buses are available between Ashland and State/Lake to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
